name: the-roofing-app-setup
description: Setup and deployment utilities for The Roofing App

scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && firebase use default && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.docker:deploy: docker stop paulroofs-app || true && docker rm paulroofs-app || true && docker run -d -p 80:80 --name paulroofs-app --restart unless-stopped paulroofs-app
scripts.validate:build: npm run build && echo 'âœ… Build validation passed'
